overview: On the tropical island of Santo Domingo in the Caribbean, legend has it that there exists and ancient medallion which gives extraordinary powers to whomever wears it. INDIANA MACK, a rich young, virile adventurer in search of the amulet, meets up with a beautiful archaeologist and the strugger for power is on! Hats off to director Kovi as he weaves a yarn packed with intrigue, passion and sexual adventure! Its your own PRIVATE paradise.
title: Indiana Mack
